description:
Manages a project access for flavor V2 resource within OpenStack.

Note: You _must_ have admin privileges in your OpenStack cloud to use
this resource.

---

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

FlavorId.description: The UUID of flavor to use. Changing this creates a new flavor access.

Region.description:
The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client.
If omitted, the `region` argument of the provider is used.
Changing this creates a new flavor access.

TenantId.description:
The UUID of tenant which is allowed to use the flavor.
Changing this creates a new flavor access.
